channel.title: TXE on Cloudant blog
channel.description: Recent content in TXE on Cloudant blog

item.title: Migrating from TXE
item.description: In this blog post we’ll show how data stored in a Cloudant on Transaction Engine (TXE) instance can be easily migrated to Cloudant Standard. There are few differences betweeen the two offerrings, so we’ll explore ways to avoid any pitfalls along the way. There isn’t a way of converting an existing account from TXE to Standard, so the first step is to provision a new Cloudant Standard account. Photo by Julia Craice on Unsplash
